channel.title: philstar.com - RSS Headlines
channel.description: Philippine News for the Filipino Global Community

item.title: 'Medical quarantine, not ECQ': Health professionals call for change in 'militaristic' lockdowns
item.author: Franco Luna
item.description: "Doctors and healthcare workers must reclaim quarantine for what it should be: a public health measure aimed at saving lives by stopping the spread of disease," the doctors said.

item.title: Fourth day of record-high single-day influx of COVID cases, Phl total breaches 100,000
item.author: Franco Luna
item.description: The country's coronavirus curve is still steadily rising with thousands of new cases now being logged each day despite the capital's first ECQ and modified ECQ in Metro Manila lasting for 76 days in March.

item.title: Motorcycle barriers may have dangerous effect on aerodynamics, riders warn
item.author: Franco Luna
item.description: "If this barrier causes an accident, who will pay for the hospitalization of our members? That's what scares us."

item.title: COVID-19 deaths may be underreported due to poor access to healthcare, Leachon says
item.description: "My view is there are around 4,000 underreported deaths. Many of those who go to emergency rooms in our hospital, at the Philippine General Hospital and in many other hospitals, the patients would only come to the hospital already in serious condition because, of course, they don’t have money."

item.title: DOH says it will 'advocate' frontliners' plea for Metro Manila 'time-out'
item.author: Franco Luna
item.description: "Dear President Duterte, healthcare workers are united in sounding off a distress signal to the nation that our healthcare system has been overwhelmed,” the letter penned by Philippine Medical Association President Jose Santiago read.

item.title: 77th Malasakit Center opens in Guimaras
item.description: The country’s 77th Malasakit Center opened Thursday at the Dr. Catalino Gallego Nava Provincial Hospital in Guimaras island with Sen. Bong Go virtually joining the launch.

item.title: DOTr inks PNR contract packages for Makati-Clark line
item.author: Richmond Mercurio
item.description: The Department of Transportation signed yesterday the first two contract packages for PNR Clark Phase 2, marking the start of construction works for the 53-kilometer extension that will connect Makati City and the Clark International Airport to cut travel time to less than an hour.

item.title: Tech woes among top concerns for distance learning
item.author: Janvic Mateo
item.description: The lack of gadgets, insufficient mobile data allowance and unstable internet connection are among the primary concerns raised by parents in relation to adopting distance learning next school year.

item.title: Mixed oil price movements seen next week
item.author: Danessa Rivera
item.description: Oil firms are expected to implement minimal price cuts on fuel products this week.

item.title: House to pass P66 billion supplemental budget for DA
item.author: Edu Punay
item.description: The House of Representatives vowed to approve the P66-billion supplemental budget sought by the Department of Agriculture to aid the agriculture and fisheries sectors overcome the economic impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.
